entry.summary: ...Summer Heat Has Arrived... * Temperatures will peak today through Monday with afternoon highs from the mid 90s to near 100 in lower valleys, and mid to upper 80s in Sierra communities. entry.cap:areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Mono; Surprise Valley California

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:35AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...INCREASING HEAT NEXT WEEK... Forecast confidence is high that inland locations will experience a significant warm-up with well above-normal temperatures beginning Monday, July 3 through Thursday, July 6.
